name: Shareabouts Map Client
description: A standalone Shareabouts map client. For documentation on configuring and deploying, see https://github.com/openplans/shareabouts#documentation

SHAREABOUTS_DATASET_ROOT.description: The root API URL for the dataset.

SHAREABOUTS_DATASET_KEY.description: The API key for the map dataset.

SECRET_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
